name: Fretted
description: An interactive guitar fretboard tool and comprehensive learning platform designed to help users master guitar techniques and music theory through hands-on practice.

name: Muunifi
description: A social media platform for crypto enthusiasts to connect, share insights, and discuss blockchain and decentralized technologies.

name: Prophit
description: A sports prop bet analyzer platform that aggregates current prop values and uses algorithms to generate projected points and insights, helping users make data-driven betting decisions.
